rev.comment: And just as boldly removing. There's no consensus to include it, and burden exists on the shoulders of those wishing to include to gain consensus to do so. That clearly doesn't exist.

In a vintage enhanced image, [[Meliton Kantaria]] raises the [[Flag of the Soviet Union|Soviet flag]] over the [[Reichstag building]] thus demonstrating that the Battle of Berlin, as well as the Eastern Front hostilities as whole, ended with the total Soviet victory.<ref name=Bellamy-663-7>{{harvnb|Bellamy|p=663-7}}</ref>
